    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ghoran Weapon Practice](/Feats.aspx?ID=3949) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ghoran" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=352" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 38</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Ghoran Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=3947)

</column>

---

With plenty of practice, the memories of previous fights from previous lives come flooding back. Whenever you critically hit using a [glaive](/Weapons.aspx?ID=20), [greatclub](/Weapons.aspx?ID=22), [hatchet](/Weapons.aspx?ID=27), [scythe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=39), [sickle](/Weapons.aspx?ID=9), or [ghoran](/Traits.aspx?ID=352) weapon, you apply the weapon's [critical specialization effect](/Rules.aspx?ID=235).
